name: Rice and Beans
ingredients: Long-grain parboiled rice, veggie stock, oil, onion, bell pepper, garlic, jalapeño, beans, cumin powder, chili powder, salt, pepper, cilantro

name: Clam Chowder
ingredients: Thick-cut bacon, diced white onions, all-purpose flour, canned minced clams, clam juice, red potatoes, bay leaf, dried thyme leaves, heavy cream, minced fresh parsely, salt, fresh ground black pepper

name: Chicken Noodle Soup
ingredients: Flour, salt, milk, eggs, Farfalle pasta, elbow macaroni, chicken breast, carrots, rotini, chicken stock
description: Balance of protein, carbs, and vegetables

name: Breakfast Burrito
ingredients: 1 avocado, 1/2 cup diced tomatoes, 2 tbsp minced shallot, 1 clove  garlic, 1 jalapeño pepper, 1 tbsp lime juice, 1/2 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp ground cumin, 1/4 cup chopped cilantro, 4 eggs, 1/4 tsp smoked paprika, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/2 lb spicy sausage, 6 oz shredded Monterey jack cheese, flour tortillas, vegetable oil
description: A very simple breakfast with protein and carbs

name: Chicken Casserole
ingredients: chicken, cream cheese, cottage cheese, sour cream, condensed cream of chicken soup, garlic powder, onion powder, ritz crackers, unsalted butter
description: Contains balance of protein and carbs

name: Protein Parfait
ingredients: Greek yogurt, maple syrup, vanilla, mixed berries (raspberries, blueberries, blackbarries), pumpkin seeds, walnuts, chia seeds, flax seed meal, cinnamon, ground cloves

name: Spaghetti
ingredients: Ground beef or turkey, onion, carrot, spinach, salt, garlic, italian seasoning, oregano, dried basil, red pepper flakes, vegetable broth, canned crush tomatoes, whole grain spaghetti

name: Tuna Casserole
ingredients: Egg noodles, butter, onion, celery, frozen peas, tuna, condensed mushroom soup, milk, cheddar cheese, parsely, panko bread crumbs, cheddar
